019package com.plotsquared.core.command;
020
021import com.google.inject.TypeLiteral;
022import com.plotsquared.core.configuration.caption.StaticCaption;
023import com.plotsquared.core.configuration.caption.TranslatableCaption;
024import com.plotsquared.core.permissions.Permission;
025import com.plotsquared.core.player.MetaDataAccess;
026import com.plotsquared.core.player.MetaDataKey;
027import com.plotsquared.core.player.PlotPlayer;
028import com.plotsquared.core.plot.Plot;
029import com.plotsquared.core.plot.comment.CommentInbox;
030import com.plotsquared.core.plot.comment.CommentManager;
031import com.plotsquared.core.plot.comment.PlotComment;
032import com.plotsquared.core.util.Permissions;
033import com.plotsquared.core.util.StringMan;
034import com.plotsquared.core.util.TabCompletions;
035import com.plotsquared.core.util.task.RunnableVal;
036import net.kyori.adventure.text.Component;
037import net.kyori.adventure.text.TextComponent;
038import net.kyori.adventure.text.minimessage.tag.Tag;
039import net.kyori.adventure.text.minimessage.tag.resolver.TagResolver;
040
041import java.util.Collection;
042import java.util.Collections;
043import java.util.LinkedList;
044import java.util.List;
045import java.util.stream.Collectors;
046
047@CommandDeclaration(command = "inbox",
048        usage = "/plot inbox [inbox] [delete <index> | clear | page]",
049        permission = "plots.inbox",
050        category = CommandCategory.CHAT,
051        requiredType = RequiredType.PLAYER)
052public class Inbox extends SubCommand {
053
054    public void displayComments(PlotPlayer<?> player, List<PlotComment> oldComments, int page) {
055        if (oldComments == null || oldComments.isEmpty()) {
056            player.sendMessage(TranslatableCaption.of("comment.inbox_empty"));
057            return;
058        }
059        PlotComment[] comments = oldComments.toArray(new PlotComment[0]);
060        if (page < 0) {
061            page = 0;
062        }
063        // Get the total pages
064        // int totalPages = ((int) Math.ceil(12 *
065        int totalPages = (int) Math.ceil(comments.length / 12);
066        if (page > totalPages) {
067            page = totalPages;
068        }
069        // Only display 12 per page
070        int max = page * 12 + 12;
071        if (max > comments.length) {
072            max = comments.length;
073        }
074        TextComponent.Builder builder = Component.text();
075        builder.append(MINI_MESSAGE.deserialize(
076                TranslatableCaption.of("list.comment_list_header_paged").getComponent(player) + '\n',
077                TagResolver.builder()
078                        .tag("amount", Tag.inserting(Component.text(comments.length)))
079                        .tag("cur", Tag.inserting(Component.text(page + 1)))
080                        .tag("max", Tag.inserting(Component.text(totalPages + 1)))
081                        .tag("word", Tag.inserting(Component.text("all")))
082                        .build()
083        ));
084
085        // This might work xD
086        for (int x = page * 12; x < max; x++) {
087            PlotComment comment = comments[x];
088            Component commentColored;
089            if (player.getName().equals(comment.senderName)) {
090                commentColored = MINI_MESSAGE
091                        .deserialize(
092                                TranslatableCaption.of("list.comment_list_by_lister").getComponent(player),
093                                TagResolver.resolver("comment", Tag.inserting(Component.text(comment.comment)))
094                        );
095            } else {
096                commentColored = MINI_MESSAGE
097                        .deserialize(
098                                TranslatableCaption.of("list.comment_list_by_other").getComponent(player),
099                                TagResolver.resolver("comment", Tag.inserting(Component.text(comment.comment)))
100                        );
101            }
102            TagResolver resolver = TagResolver.builder()
103                    .tag("number", Tag.inserting(Component.text(x)))
104                    .tag("world", Tag.inserting(Component.text(comment.world)))
105                    .tag("plot_id", Tag.inserting(Component.text(comment.id.getX() + ";" + comment.id.getY())))
106                    .tag("commenter", Tag.inserting(Component.text(comment.senderName)))
107                    .tag("comment", Tag.inserting(commentColored))
108                    .build();
109            builder.append(MINI_MESSAGE
110                    .deserialize(
111                            TranslatableCaption.of("list.comment_list_comment").getComponent(player),
112                            resolver
113                    ));
114        }
115        player.sendMessage(StaticCaption.of(MINI_MESSAGE.serialize(builder.build())));
116    }
117
118    @Override
119    public boolean onCommand(final PlotPlayer<?> player, String[] args) {
120        final Plot plot = player.getCurrentPlot();
121        if (plot == null) {
122            player.sendMessage(TranslatableCaption.of("errors.not_in_plot"));
123            return false;
124        }
125        if (!plot.hasOwner()) {
126            player.sendMessage(TranslatableCaption.of("info.plot_unowned"));
127            return false;
128        }
129        if (args.length == 0) {
130            sendUsage(player);
131            for (final CommentInbox inbox : CommentManager.inboxes.values()) {
132                if (inbox.canRead(plot, player)) {
133                    if (!inbox.getComments(plot, new RunnableVal<>() {
134                        @Override
135                        public void run(List<PlotComment> value) {
136                            if (value != null) {
137                                int total = 0;
138                                int unread = 0;
139                                for (PlotComment comment : value) {
140                                    total++;
141                                    if (comment.timestamp > CommentManager
142                                            .getTimestamp(player, inbox.toString())) {
143                                        unread++;
144                                    }
145                                }
146                                if (total != 0) {
147                                    player.sendMessage(
148                                            TranslatableCaption.of("comment.inbox_item"),
149                                            TagResolver.resolver(
150                                                    "value",
151                                                    Tag.inserting(Component.text(inbox + " (" + total + '/' + unread + ')'))
152                                            )
153                                    );
154                                    return;
155                                }
156                            }
157                            player.sendMessage(
158                                    TranslatableCaption.of("comment.inbox_item"),
159                                    TagResolver.resolver("value", Tag.inserting(Component.text(inbox.toString())))
160                            );
161                        }
162                    })) {
163                        player.sendMessage(
164                                TranslatableCaption.of("comment.inbox_item"),
165                                TagResolver.resolver("value", Tag.inserting(Component.text(inbox.toString())))
166                        );
167                    }
168                }
169            }
170            return false;
171        }
172        final CommentInbox inbox = CommentManager.inboxes.get(args[0].toLowerCase());
173        if (inbox == null) {
174            player.sendMessage(
175                    TranslatableCaption.of("comment.invalid_inbox"),
176                    TagResolver.resolver(
177                            "list",
178                            Tag.inserting(Component.text(StringMan.join(CommentManager.inboxes.keySet(), ", ")))
179                    )
180            );
181            return false;
182        }
183        final MetaDataKey<Long> metaDataKey = MetaDataKey.of(
184                String.format("inbox:%s", inbox),
185                new TypeLiteral<>() {
186                }
187        );
188        try (final MetaDataAccess<Long> metaDataAccess = player.accessTemporaryMetaData(metaDataKey)) {
189            metaDataAccess.set(System.currentTimeMillis());
190        }
191        final int page;
192        if (args.length > 1) {
193            switch (args[1].toLowerCase()) {
194                case "delete":
195                    if (!inbox.canModify(plot, player)) {
196                        player.sendMessage(TranslatableCaption.of("comment.no_perm_inbox_modify"));
197                        return false;
198                    }
199                    if (args.length != 3) {
200                        player.sendMessage(
201                                TranslatableCaption.of("commandconfig.command_syntax"),
202                                TagResolver.resolver(
203                                        "value",
204                                        Tag.inserting(Component.text("/plot inbox " + inbox + " delete <index>"))
205                                )
206                        );
207                        return true;
208                    }
209                    final int index;
210                    try {
211                        index = Integer.parseInt(args[2]);
212                        if (index < 1) {
213                            player.sendMessage(
214                                    TranslatableCaption.of("comment.not_valid_inbox_index"),
215                                    TagResolver.resolver("number", Tag.inserting(Component.text(index)))
216                            );
217                            return false;
218                        }
219                    } catch (NumberFormatException ignored) {
220                        player.sendMessage(
221                                TranslatableCaption.of("commandconfig.command_syntax"),
222                                TagResolver.resolver(
223                                        "value",
224                                        Tag.inserting(Component.text("/plot inbox " + inbox + " delete <index>"))
225                                )
226                        );
227                        return false;
228                    }
229
230                    if (!inbox.getComments(plot, new RunnableVal<>() {
231                        @Override
232                        public void run(List<PlotComment> value) {
233                            if (index > value.size()) {
234                                player.sendMessage(
235                                        TranslatableCaption.of("comment.not_valid_inbox_index"),
236                                        TagResolver.resolver("number", Tag.inserting(Component.text(index)))
237                                );
238                                return;
239                            }
240                            PlotComment comment = value.get(index - 1);
241                            inbox.removeComment(plot, comment);
242                            boolean success = plot.getPlotCommentContainer().removeComment(comment);
243                            if (success) {
244                                player.sendMessage(
245                                        TranslatableCaption.of("comment.comment_removed_success"),
246                                        TagResolver.resolver("value", Tag.inserting(Component.text(comment.comment)))
247                                );
248                            } else {
249                                player.sendMessage(
250                                        TranslatableCaption.of("comment.comment_removed_failure"));
251                            }
252                        }
253                    })) {
254                        player.sendMessage(TranslatableCaption.of("errors.not_in_plot"));
255                        return false;
256                    }
257                    return true;
258                case "clear":
259                    if (!inbox.canModify(plot, player)) {
260                        player.sendMessage(TranslatableCaption.of("comment.no_perm_inbox_modify"));
261                    }
262                    inbox.clearInbox(plot);
263                    List<PlotComment> comments = plot.getPlotCommentContainer().getComments(inbox.toString());
264                    if (!comments.isEmpty()) {
265                        player.sendMessage(
266                                TranslatableCaption.of("comment.comment_removed_success"),
267                                TagResolver.resolver("value", Tag.inserting(Component.text("*")))
268                        );
269                        plot.getPlotCommentContainer().removeComments(comments);
270                    }
271                    return true;
272                default:
273                    try {
274                        page = Integer.parseInt(args[1]);
275                    } catch (NumberFormatException ignored) {
276                        sendUsage(player);
277                        return false;
278                    }
279            }
280        } else {
281            page = 1;
282        }
283        if (!inbox.canRead(plot, player)) {
284            player.sendMessage(TranslatableCaption.of("comment.no_perm_inbox"));
285            return false;
286        }
287        if (!inbox.getComments(plot, new RunnableVal<>() {
288            @Override
289            public void run(List<PlotComment> value) {
290                displayComments(player, value, page);
291            }
292        })) {
293            player.sendMessage(TranslatableCaption.of("info.plot_unowned"));
294            return false;
295        }
296        return true;
297    }
298
299    @Override
300    public Collection<Command> tab(final PlotPlayer<?> player, final String[] args, final boolean space) {
301        if (args.length == 1) {
302            final List<String> completions = new LinkedList<>();
303            if (Permissions.hasPermission(player, Permission.PERMISSION_INBOX_READ_OWNER)) {
304                completions.add("owner");
305            }
306            if (Permissions.hasPermission(player, Permission.PERMISSION_INBOX_READ_PUBLIC)) {
307                completions.add("public");
308            }
309            if (Permissions.hasPermission(player, Permission.PERMISSION_INBOX_READ_REPORT)) {
310                completions.add("report");
311            }
312            final List<Command> commands = completions.stream().filter(completion -> completion
313                            .toLowerCase()
314                            .startsWith(args[0].toLowerCase()))
315                    .map(completion -> new Command(null, true, completion, "", RequiredType.PLAYER, CommandCategory.CHAT) {
316                    }).collect(Collectors.toCollection(LinkedList::new));
317            if (Permissions.hasPermission(player, Permission.PERMISSION_INBOX) && args[0].length() > 0) {
318                commands.addAll(TabCompletions.completePlayers(player, args[0], Collections.emptyList()));
319            }
320            return commands;
321        }
322        return TabCompletions.completePlayers(player, String.join(",", args).trim(), Collections.emptyList());
323    }
324
325}
